contentrichtext.text: == Licensing == {{Non-free stamp|image has rationale=yes}} == Fair use image data == {{Non-free image data |Description = Tanzania 1sh stamp of 1965 . |Source = scanned by [[User:Stan Shebs]] |Portion = Entire stamp. |Low_resolution = Sufficient resolution for illustration, but considerably lower resolution than original. |other_information = Intellectual property owned by {{#if:|{{{4}}}|the issuing postal authority}}. }} == Fair use rationale == {{Non-free image rationale |Article = Postage stamps and postal history of Tanzania |Purpose = Used for purposes of illustration in an educational article about the entity represented by the image. |Replaceability = Protected by copyright, therefore a free use alternative won't exist. }}
